page.content:
Tredegar,My Town- 1st Year Juniors(7-8)
Our town is famous for ; Bedwellty Park and Folk lore, Lump of coal and Roman Wall, Town clock 72 feet tall. Cholera graves and nine arches, Striking miners on protest marches. Freedom,the goal for which our chartists fought, Rugby is our favourite sport. Famous sons ? - we've quite a few, Aneurin Bevan and Neil Kinnock too, Ray Reardon, world champ at snooker, Denzil Williams - a famous hooker. Old iron works and coal mines, Add character to our mountain skyline. Time to spare ? - we're worth a visit, Domesday records you'll us inherit.
